Properties.ProtectedString:
local Tool = script.Parent local Character; local Player;
local RELOAD_TIME = 13
------------------------------------------ local function WaitFor(parent) return setmetatable({}, { __index = function(tb, child) return function() while not parent:FindFirstChild(child) do parent.ChildAdded:wait() end return parent:FindFirstChild(child) end end; }) end ----------------------------------------
local Handle = WaitFor(Tool).Handle() local NextFireAt = WaitFor(Tool).NextFireAt() local ThrowSound = WaitFor(Handle).ThrowSound()
local GrenadeScript = WaitFor(Tool).GrenadeScript()
local function Now() return game.Workspace.DistributedGameTime end
---------------------------------------------
local Velocity = 120 function computeLaunchAngle(dx, dy, grav) -- This function is nasty or what? :P -- There are ways to solve launch angle of a projectile given a point in 3D space -- This one solves for tan(theta)
-- Simplify the distance formula of a projectile local g = math.abs(grav) local inRoot = (Velocity * Velocity * Velocity * Velocity) - (g * ((g * dx * dx) + (2 * dy * Velocity * Velocity))) if inRoot <= 0 then return 0.25 * math.pi end local root = math.sqrt(inRoot) local inATan1 = ((Velocity * Velocity) + root) / (g*dx)
local inATan2 = ((Velocity * Velocity) - root) / (g*dx) local a1 = math.atan(inATan1) local a2 = math.atan(inATan2) if a1 < a2 then return a1 end return a2 end
---------------------------------------------
local HoldAnim, ThrowAnim;
Tool.Equipped:connect(function(mouse) Character = Tool.Parent Player = game.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(Character)
local HoldAnimSrc = WaitFor(Tool).HoldAnim() HoldAnimSrc.AnimationId = 'http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=88743592' local ThrowAnimSrc = WaitFor(Tool).ThrowAnim() ThrowAnimSrc.AnimationId = 'http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=88743566'
HoldAnim = Character.Humanoid:LoadAnimation(HoldAnimSrc) ThrowAnim = Character.Humanoid:LoadAnimation(ThrowAnimSrc)
--setup first anim / cursor cycle if Now() > NextFireAt.Value then Handle.Transparency = 0 mouse.Icon = 'rbxasset://textures\\GunCursor.png' HoldAnim:Play() else Handle.Transparency = 1 Delay(NextFireAt.Value - Now(), function() mouse.Icon = 'rbxasset://textures\\GunWaitCursor.png' Handle.Transparency = 0 HoldAnim:Play() end) end
mouse.Button1Down:connect(function() --we track the reload time like this so that the player can't fire faster with --rapid dis / re-equipping, which will actually be common usage with this gear. if Now() > NextFireAt.Value then NextFireAt.Value = Now() + RELOAD_TIME -- local gr = Handle:Clone() gr.CanCollide = false local sc = GrenadeScript:Clone() sc.Parent = gr sc.Disabled = false WaitFor(sc).creator().Value = Player
--calc velocity local toTarget = mouse.Hit.p - gr.Position local dy = toTarget.y toTarget = Vector3.new(toTarget.x, 0, toTarget.z) local dx = toTarget.magnitude toTarget = toTarget.unit
Velocity = math.min(120, 40 + dx)
local theta = computeLaunchAngle(dx, dy, 196.2)
local vY = math.sin(theta)*Velocity local vX = toTarget.x * math.cos(theta) * Velocity local vZ = toTarget.z * math.cos(theta) * Velocity
gr.CanCollide = false Delay(0.1, function() gr.CanCollide = true end) gr.Velocity = Vector3.new(vX, vY, vZ) gr.Parent = game.Workspace
--play sound / anim ThrowSound:Play() HoldAnim:Stop(0) ThrowAnim:Play(0,1,1)
--reload Handle.Transparency = 1 mouse.Icon = 'rbxasset://textures\\GunWaitCursor.png' wait(RELOAD_TIME) HoldAnim:Play() Handle.Transparency = 0 mouse.Icon = 'rbxasset://textures\\GunCursor.png' end end) end)
Tool.Unequipped:connect(function() if ThrowSound then ThrowSound:Stop() end if ThrowAnim then ThrowAnim:Stop() end if HoldAnim then HoldAnim:Stop() end end)

local RbxUtility = LoadLibrary('RbxUtility') local Create = RbxUtility.Create
------------------------------------------ local function WaitFor(parent) return setmetatable({}, { __index = function(tb, child) return function() while not parent:FindFirstChild(child) do parent.ChildAdded:wait() end return parent:FindFirstChild(child) end end; }) end ----------------------------------------
local Grenade = script.Parent local creator = WaitFor(script).creator()
local EFFECT_RADIUS = 10
--game.Debris:AddItem(Grenade, 30)
local function FindHumanoid(part) return (part.Parent or game):FindFirstChild('Humanoid') or ((part.Parent or game).Parent or game):FindFirstChild('Humanoid') end
--wait for us to hit something that isn't a humanoid and is cancollide do local hitSomethingEvent = Instance.new('BindableEvent') Grenade.Touched:connect(function(part) if part.CanCollide and not FindHumanoid(part) then hitSomethingEvent:Fire() end end) hitSomethingEvent.Event:wait() end
--remove the grenade Grenade.CanCollide = false Grenade.Anchored = true Grenade.Transparency = 1
--generate our zombie effect local EffectAt = Grenade.Position
local ZombieHands = {} for i = 1, 10 do --find an location to put the hand at. local at = EffectAt + Vector3.new(math.random(-EFFECT_RADIUS,EFFECT_RADIUS), 0, math.random(-EFFECT_RADIUS,EFFECT_RADIUS)) local foundSpot; local ignoreList = {} local ray = Ray.new(at+Vector3.new(0, 20, 0), Vector3.new(0,-999,0)) while true do local hit, at = game.Workspace:FindPartOnRayWithIgnoreList(ray, ignoreList) if hit then if not hit.CanCollide or FindHumanoid(hit) then ignoreList[#ignoreList+1] = hit else foundSpot = at break end else break end end
if foundSpot then --found a spot to place a hand at local hand = {} hand.CFrame = CFrame.new(foundSpot)*CFrame.Angles(0, 2*math.random()*math.pi, 0)
--make a bunch of bits of "earth" around the hand hand.EarthBits = {} for i = 1, 3 do local bit = {} bit.Part = Create'Part'{ Name = 'EarthBit'; Anchored = true; CanCollide = false; FormFactor = 'Custom'; Size = Vector3.new(1 + math.random(),0.4,1+math.random()); BrickColor = BrickColor.new(217); } bit.C0 = CFrame.Angles(0, math.pi*2/3*i + math.random()*0.1, 0) bit.C1 = CFrame.new(0, 0, 0.5) hand.EarthBits[i] = bit end
--make the part hand.Part = Create'Part'{ Name = 'ZombieHand'; Anchored = true; CanCollide = false; FormFactor = 'Custom'; Size = Vector3.new(2,1,1); -- Create'SpecialMesh'{ Name = 'Mesh'; MeshId = 'http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=89391425'; TextureId = 'http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=89391492'; Scale = Vector3.new(3,3,3); }; }
--make some other data for the hand hand.Level = 0 hand.Mode = 'Rise' --Rise / Search / Fall hand.Caught = nil hand.A = math.random() hand.Delay = math.random() ZombieHands[hand] = true end end
--set up touched handling for hands for hand, _ in pairs(ZombieHands) do hand.Part.Touched:connect(function(part) local hum = FindHumanoid(part) if hum then hand.Mode = 'Fall' hand.Caught = hum --tag local tag = creator:Clone() tag.Parent = hum game.Debris:AddItem(tag, 3) end end) end
--9 seconds in we should start all of the hands falling Delay(9, function() for hand, _ in pairs(ZombieHands) do hand.Mode = 'Fall' end end)
--animate it local StartTime = tick() local LastTime = StartTime while true do local Now = tick() local dt = Now-LastTime LastTime = Now local Elapsed = Now-StartTime
--end after 10 seconds if Elapsed > 10 then break end
-- for hand, _ in pairs(ZombieHands) do local Elapsed = Elapsed - hand.Delay if Elapsed > 0 then
--place the hand hand.Part.Parent = Grenade hand.Part.CFrame = hand.CFrame * CFrame.Angles(math.sin(Elapsed+hand.A)*0.5, 0, math.sin(Elapsed)*0.5) * CFrame.new(0, hand.Level-1.2, 0) * CFrame.Angles(math.pi/2, -math.pi/2, 0) * CFrame.new(0, 0, -0.4)
--first, rise or fall the hand if hand.Mode == 'Rise' then hand.Level = math.min(2, hand.Level + dt*2) if hand.Level >= 2 then hand.Mode = 'Search' end elseif hand.Mode == 'Fall' then hand.Level = math.max(0, hand.Level - dt*2) if hand.Level <= 0 then ZombieHands[hand] = nil hand.Part:Destroy()
--make sure we kill the caught if hand.Caught then hand.Caught:TakeDamage(hand.Caught.Health) end end
--if it captured something then drag it down if hand.Caught then local torso = hand.Caught.Parent:FindFirstChild('Torso') if torso then torso.Anchored = true torso.CFrame = CFrame.new(0,-dt*4,0)*torso.CFrame hand.Caught:TakeDamage(2) else hand.Caught:TakeDamage(hand.Caught.Health) hand.Caught = nil end end else --nothing to do end
--now if it's just started rising move the dirt bits if Elapsed < 0.8 then local T = Elapsed/0.8 for _, bit in pairs(hand.EarthBits) do bit.Part.Parent = Grenade bit.Part.CFrame = hand.CFrame * bit.C0 * CFrame.Angles(T*0.3, 0, 0) * CFrame.new(0, 0.2+0.2*T, T*0.5) * bit.C1 end end
-- if hand.Mode == 'Fall' then for _, bit in pairs(hand.EarthBits) do bit.Part.Transparency = 1-(hand.Level/2) end end end end -- wait() end
--kill any remaining caught players for hand, _ in pairs(ZombieHands) do if hand.Caught then hand.Caught:TakeDamage(hand.Caught.Health) end end
--destroy us. All of our stuff has been parented to the grenade so this will do cleanup Grenade:Destroy()
